
sudo lsof -i :4569

COMMAND   PID    USER   FD   TYPE DEVICE SIZE/OFF NODE NAME
zoiper  53390 btl-671   23u  IPv4 606530      0t0  UDP *:iax 

kill -9 53390
sudo netstat -tuln | grep :4569
sudo netstat -tuln | grep -i :4569

then

click on it
